definition: a barrier that serves to enclose an area, have an argument about something
details:
noun
- a barrier that serves to enclose an area
= synonyms: fencing
- a dealer in stolen property
verb
- have an argument about something
= synonyms: debate, contend, argue
- surround with a wall in order to fortify
= synonyms: palisade, wall, surround, fence in
- fight with fencing swords
- enclose with a fence
= example: enclose with a fence
= synonyms: fence in
- receive stolen goods
